node.title: Tech billionaire Mike Cannon-Brookes buys stake in Rabbitohs
node.alt: A man wearing a baseball cap and talking into a microphone
node.description: The entrepreneur and philanthropist says he is "excited and humbled" to become part of the club, of which he has been a long-time supporter.
node.content:
["Tech billionaire and philanthropist Mike Cannon-Brookes has joined the list of celebrity owners of the the South Sydney Rabbitohs rugby league\u00a0club, alongside Hollywood actor Russell Crowe and casino mogul James Packer.", "The football team\u00a0is\u00a0the latest addition to the 41-year-old entrepreneur and investor's growing portfolio of assets.", "\"I'm excited and humbled to be a part of this iconic club,\" Cannon-Brookes said.", "\"I'm looking forward to partnering with Russell and James and bringing what I can to the table to help the club grow to even greater heights.\"", "It's not the first foray into sport for the man who co-founded the Sydney-based software powerhouse Atlassian with Scott Farquhar, a fellow graduate\u00a0from\u00a0the University of NSW. \u00a0", "Last year, he bought a minority stake in National Basketball Association team, the Utah Jazz, in the United States, becoming the first Australian part-owner of an NBA team.\u00a0\u00a0", "In a statement, Crowe revealed Cannon-Brookes was a long-time Rabbitohs fan.", "", "
Mike Cannon-Brookes will become a co-owner alongside James Packer (L) and Russell Crowe, seen here at a Rabbitohs match.(Getty: Cameron Spencer)
", "\"I'm sure that it hasn't gone unnoticed to South Sydney members and supporters that Mike wears a white Rabbitohs hat for special occasions,\" he said.", "Crowe said having the software tycoon on board would give the club an edge when it comes to harnessing emerging technologies.", "Packer said he looked forward to working with his new co-owner.", "\"I am really pleased that Mike is joining us because I know how committed he is to the community,\" he said.\u00a0", "Cannon-Brookes regularly makes the list of Australia's richest people.", "He and his wife Annie have been outspoken about climate change and last month pledged to spend $1.5 billion to limit global warming.\u00a0", "Rabbitohs co-chair Nick\u00a0Pappas welcomed the latest investment in the club\u00a0from what he called\u00a0\"the big end of town\".", "The football club has come through a rocky financial period.", "Crowe and businessman Peter Holmes a Court bought the struggling club for $3 million in 2005 and invested a further $6 million in subsequent years.", "In 2014, Packer bought Holmes a Court's stake.", "Two years later, the club was in trouble again, with Packer and Crowe agreeing to dig into their own pockets to clear a\u00a0$7 million debt.\u00a0", "At the time, the club's chairman said it left South Sydney\u00a0in the \"best financial position of its history\".", "Cannon-Brookes has bought\u00a0one third of the company that owns 75 per cent of the Rabbitohs.", "The remaining 25 per cent is owned by the club's members.\u00a0"]
